alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 2:51PM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches in southern Douglas county. Higher amounts of 7 to 11 inches in northern Douglas county. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Douglas County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
